messages.install: <center>Thanks for installing the DNS Techpack for Minecraft 1.12.2! Have fun!</center>
messages.update:
****WARNING**** BACKUP YOUR WORLDS, you may lose stuff
Please read the changelog, This is a massive update and you may lose a lot of stuff!!!!. Have fun!

warnings.warning:
Sponge is currently in a BETA state.

When reporting an issue you must state that you are using sponge!

TechReborn changes the recipes of items from other mods.

This mod is very similar to old GregTech and is not for the faint-hearted.
RandomPatches is a fairly unstable mod that can potentially work counter-productive. Use at your own risk!

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Core library used by all Minecraft mods

mod.name: DNS Menu Resources
mod.description: DNS Techpack Resources

mod.name: Server Libs
mod.description: Missing library for servers, missing from the ATLauncher install

mod.name: DNS Title Logo
mod.description: Just our logo for the title screen

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: Various Extensions for Applied Energistics 2

mod.name: Akashic Tome
mod.description: The book of books.

mod.name: Anima Mundi
mod.description: Moving items around without pipes

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: Aroma1997's Dimensional World
mod.description: This mod adds a new Dimension especially for mining. It is pretty much like the overworld, just different. :-)

mod.name: Backpacks!
mod.description: Adds upgradable, customizable backpacks that can be opened with right-click from almost any gui and can be configured to automatically collect specific types of items. Also includes a recipe editor

mod.name: Better Builder's Wands
mod.description: Wands that allow placing of multiple blocks at a time

mod.name: Binnie's Mods
mod.description: Various expansions for Forestry adding new bees and trees

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds over 50 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.name: Calculator
mod.description: Whoever said Calculators were boring?! Awesome Calculators, crazy items, mind-blowing machines and hundreds of hidden recipes. Change the way you craft, change the way you play, change the way you think. Thank you for trying Calculator!

mod.name: Chest Transporter
mod.description: Adds an item that allows you to transport chests.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management Credits: Sanguine - Texture Supporters:

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: Cooking for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a cooking book and multiblock kitchens that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory.

mod.name: Crafting Tweaks
mod.description: Allows you to rotate or clear the crafting matrix by the press of a button, in any (supported) crafting window.

mod.name: Dark Utilities
mod.description: A mod that adds a bunch of new utilities to the game.

mod.name: DeepResonance
mod.description: Power generation based on resonanting crystals

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: This is a mod that was originally made for the Tolkiencraft mod pack but it has since evolved way beyond that. This mod adds a lot of extremely expensive and powerful end game items as well as a lot of random useful bits and pieces.

mod.name: Ender-Rift
mod.description: The Powered Bottomless Storage System

mod.name: EnderStorage
mod.description: Stores your stuff in the END!

mod.name: Ender Utilities
mod.description: Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mod.name: Energy Converters
mod.description: A mod to freely convert between different energy systems like IC2, RF and Tesla

mod.name: Environmental Tech
mod.description: Environmental Tech is a mod containing a vast selection of multiblock machines. Ranging from multiblock solar panels, lightning rods to multiblock Void mining machines. This mod is still in the very early stages and has a lot more to come.

mod.name: ET Lunar
mod.description: ET Lunar is an addon for Environmental Tech adding some lunar themed multiblocks.

mod.name: Extended Crafting
mod.description: Adds some new ways to craft items, as well as extra crafting items and utilities.

mod.name: Extra Cells 2
mod.description: Adds new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE 2.

mod.name: Extra Utilities 2
mod.description: A bunch of useful things.

mod.name: Extreme Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) and Tesla power. This is a port of the 1.7.10 mod Big Reactors from ErogenousBeef

mod.name: Fancy Fluid Storage
mod.description: A simple fluid storage mod that's gonna fancy up your world!

mod.name: Farming for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a seed market with a search bar and a scrolling grid.

mod.name: FoamFix
mod.description: Questionable "performance improvements" that are not in Forge for probably very good reasons.

mod.name: Flux Networks
mod.description: Create Wireless Energy Networks

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: GeneralLaymansAestheticSpyingScreen
mod.description: Also known as GLASS

mod.name: Gravestone Mod
mod.description: Gravestone Mod

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Industrial Foregoing
mod.description: A small reinvention of Minefactory Reloaded.

mod.name: Integrated Dynamics
mod.description: Take full and automated control of your appliances.

mod.name: Integrated Tunnels
mod.description: Transfer other stuff over Integrated Dynamics networks

mod.name: Integration Foregoing
mod.description: An addon mod for Industrial Foregoing!

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: Item Zoom
mod.description: Shows a big version of the item you hover over.

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: JEI Bees
mod.description: Adds JEI recipes that show breeding and products from Forestry bees, trees and butterflies.

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: MalisisBlocks
mod.description: Vanishing and mixed blocks.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: MalisisSwitches
mod.description: Wireless Switches for Minecraft

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mod.name: MekanismGenerators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: MekanismTools
mod.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mod.name: Moar Tinkers
mod.description: Adds moar tinker materials and traits!

mod.name: Modular Machinery
mod.description: A modpack-maker toolset to create custom, massive, unique and complex machines and recipes from scratch with JSON. Wiki: https://github.com/HellFirePvP/ModularMachinery/wiki

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: Mystical Agriculture
mod.description: Adds Resource Crops, Armor, Tools, and other fun stuff!

mod.name: Mystical Agradditions
mod.description: An addon for Mystical Agriculture.

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mod.name: Neat
mod.description: Minimalistic Functional Unit Plates for the modern Minecrafter

mod.name: NoMoreRecipeConflict
mod.description: Switch between conflicting recipes

mod.name: NotEnoughIDs
mod.description: Extends hardcoded block ID limit.

mod.name: Not Enough Items
mod.description: Recipe Viewer, Inventory Manager, Item Spawner, Cheats and more. <plugins> Supporters: EmuCraft Team, Victor Zimmer, lexi85, Ace_Trainer_Tullius, Bacon_Donut, Sleement, Ninja 5tyl3, Disalot, Gamer2313, Majorangejuice

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: PortalGun
mod.description: Adds the Portal Gun and various other aspects from Portal/Portal 2 to Minecraft

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Unlimited Fluid Transport

mod.name: Proxy
mod.description: Adds a block that acts as a proxy to other blocks, allowing remote access to inventories, tanks, energy and other capabilities.

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: QuantumStorage
mod.description: A mod that adds a Deep Storage Unit to hold all the things

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Ranged Pumps
mod.description: Ranged Pumps is a simple mod that adds a pump that pumps liquids in a range

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Behold the Redstone (Flux) Revolution - provides Flux-Infused Tools and Armor!

mod.name: RF Lux
mod.description: Lights, lsolorights, and more lights

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: RFTools Control
mod.description: RFTools Control Addon

mod.name: Solar Flux Reborn
mod.description: Solar Panels producing Redstone Flux

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Storage Drawers Extras
mod.description: Additional drawers from third party materials.

mod.name: Tech Reborn
mod.description: Tech Reborn is a completely standalone tech mod designed by the ideals of GregTech 2 and Industrial Craft 2 pre-experimental. The mod includes tools and machines to gather resources, process materials, and progression throughout the mod. http://www.techreborn.ovh/

mod.name: TexFix
mod.description: Reduce the memory footprint of your textures

mod.name: The One Probe
mod.description: A Probe to rule them all!

mod.name: Tiny Progressions
mod.description: Cobblegens, Growth Crystals and Watering Cans and more oh my!

mod.name: TOP Addons
mod.description: TheOneProbe support for some mods.

mod.name: Thermal Cultivation
mod.description: Thermal gets Agrarian - provides options for farming and related activities!

mod.name: Thermal Dynamics
mod.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Tinker I/O
mod.description: Smeltery Upgrade!

mod.name: Tree Chopper
mod.description: Simple mod for chop down whole tree and much more.. Recommended forge version: 1.12.1 - 14.22.1.2478

mod.name: UsefulDNS
mod.description: useful items and blocks for the DNS Techpack

mod.name: Water Strainer
mod.description: Adds water strainers to filter water for common resources.

mod.name: Waystones
mod.description: Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.

mod.name: XNet
mod.description: Advanced Networking

mod.name: Actually Baubles
mod.description: Baubles capability for some Actually Additions gadgets!

mod.name: AppleSkin
mod.description: Adds various food-related HUD improvements

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: AutoRegLib
mod.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used by most of my mods from now on

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: CodeChicken Lib
mod.description: CodeChickenLib is a library of systems to help make various aspects of minecraft modding easier. It contains libraries for 3D math and transformations, model rendering, packets, config, colours, asm and a few other things..

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: CoFH World
mod.description: Provides advanced and highly customizable world generation capabilities.

mod.name: CommonCapabilities
mod.description: Forge Capabilities that can be shared by multiple mods

mod.name: Controlling
mod.description: Gives people more Control of the key binding screen.

mod.name: CraftTweaker2
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: CTM
mod.description: Allows resource packs to add connected textures, emissive rendering, and much more.

mod.name: Cucumber
mod.description: Shared code for all my mods.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Cyclops Core
mod.description: Coremod for EvilCraft, Integrated Dynamics and others.

mod.name: Default Options
mod.description: A way for modpacks to ship a default (key) configuration without having to include an options.txt file.

mod.name: ElecCore
mod.description: Shared code for Forge mods

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: Shadowfacts' Forgelin
mod.description: Kotlin helper library for Forge.

mod.name: Hammer Core
mod.description: Core used by most of Pengu's Mods.

mod.name: iChunUtil
mod.description: Shared library mod required by several of iChun's Mods.

mod.name: InitialInventory
mod.description: Allows you to set an Initial Inventory for a player using ZenScript

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: MCMultiPart
mod.description: A universal multipart API for modern Minecraft

mod.name: Mod Name Tooltip
mod.description: Shows the mod an ItemStack is from on its tooltip.

mod.name: Mod Tweaker
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for CraftTweaker, a recipe manipulator utility for Minecraft. It allows you to modify the recipes of other mods that add their own crafting mechanics

mod.name: MTLib
mod.description: Library files for Minetweaker Addons

mod.name: Quick Leaf Decay
mod.description: Makes leaf decay faster

mod.name: Reborn Core
mod.description: Reborn Core is a library used for many of the Tech Reborn team's mods, including Tech Reborn, Quantum Storage, Fluxed Redstone, Hardcore Map Reset, and many more.

mod.name: Redstone Flux
mod.description: The Redstone Flux API - the cornerstone of Energy Transfer in modded Minecraft since 1.6.4.

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: SonarCore
mod.description: Sonar's Modding Framework

mod.name: TESLA
mod.description: A modern power API

mod.name: Tesla Core Lib
mod.description: Just the most awesome lib mod out there!

mod.name: Toast Control
mod.description: Control what toasts are enabled, because some of them are useless.

mod.name: UniDict
mod.description: a mod about unifying all the things.

mod.name: WanionLib
mod.description: Shared Code Library Used by (not)all WanionCane mods!

mod.name: Valkyrie Lib
mod.description: Library for all of ValkyrieofNight's Mods

mod.name: Zero CORE
mod.description: Utility mod and multiblock API

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.12-1.4. Built: 2017-09-20-18:01:23.

mod.name: Astral Sorcery
mod.description: Magic mod that draws power from stars and their constellations

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft. This time with a fancy number in front.

mod.name: Embers
mod.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mod.name: EverlastingAbilities
mod.description: Discover, share and conquer abilities that stick.

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic Spellcasting Instruments

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: Torcherino
mod.description: Simple mod that adds OP torches.

mod.name: libVulpes
mod.description: A Library containing code for multiblocks and ore/item registration and access

mod.name: Advanced Rocketry
mod.description: A space mod for minecraft, adds planets, rockets, and some machines

mod.name: Autoverse
mod.description: Automation and logic by item flow

mod.name: Compact Machines 3
mod.description: It's all so tiny!

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Ender IO: It's back! May be unstable with a couple of other mods.

mod.name: Ender IO endergy
mod.description: All the overpowered stuff to compete with other mods

mod.name: Ender IO Zoo
mod.description: All the creatures that will kill you when you least expect it

mod.name: Exponential Power
mod.description: Lets you create a system of EXPONENTIAL POWER! :)

mod.name: NuclearCraft
mod.description: Nuclear Physics, Minecraft Style (WIP)

mod.name: Refined Storage
mod.description: An elegant solution to your hoarding problem

mod.name: RebornStorage
mod.description: Refined Storage addon - Multiblock pattern crafter.

mod.name: Refined Storage Addons
mod.description: An addon mod for Refined Storage

mod.name: RFTools Dimensions
mod.description: RFTools Dimensions Addon

mod.name: Simple Storage Network
mod.description: A simplified version of the abandoned Storage Network mod from MrRiegel. Connect your inventories and manage your items easily.

mod.name: SteamWorld
mod.description: Lots of Steam-Powered machines.

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: Expanding minecraft's food system.

mod.name: Just Enough HarvestCraft
mod.description: This is a mod that adds JEI integration for Pam's HarvestCraft.

mod.name: The Lost Cities
mod.description: The Lost Cities World Generator

mod.name: Lost Souls
mod.description: Lost Soul addon mod for The Lost Cities

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: AromaBackup
mod.description: This is a small Backup mod I created. All it does: Backups. It also works on clients!

mod.name: CTD Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks for the CTD official servers.

mod.name: CTD Core
mod.description: A library mod for mods by TheMasterGeneral and/or Chase the Dragon members.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: ProjectE
mod.description: A complete rewrite of EE2 for modern Minecraft versions.

mod.name: RandomPatches
mod.description: A bunch of miscellaneous patches for Minecraft. Servers running this don't need their players to have it installed.

mod.name: TickProfiler
mod.description: A small mod for servers to assist with finding which TileEntities(machines) and Entities are being slow.

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.

mod.name: FastAsyncWorldEdit
mod.description: Worldedit. Faster and asyncronous.

mod.name: WorldEdit CUI
mod.description: WorldEdit CUI Forge Edition 2 is a forge client-side user interface for WorldEdit

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds in tons of fancy blocks for decoration, crafted using the Chisel.

mod.name: Chance Cubes
mod.description: A Game of Chance and Skill
